Package com.techhounds.houndutil.houndlib.leds

Class ExtendedColor

java.lang.Object
com.techhounds.houndutil.houndlib.leds.ExtendedColor
public class ExtendedColor extends Object
A utility class that provides conversions between RGB values and HSV values.
